setting.location: Private study in merchant's apartment above textile shop, Warsaw city center, 19th century Polish intellectual's workspace

characters.appearance: Man in early 40s, dark hair, intense expression, signs of fatigue around eyes
characters.clothing: White shirt with sleeves rolled up, vest unbuttoned, black trousers
characters.position: Seated at large desk covered with scientific equipment
characters.action: Adjusting brass microscope while making detailed sketches in notebook

scene.mainElements: Study filled with scientific instruments, books, and chemical apparatus, the merchant deeply absorbed in microscopic examination, walls lined with scholarly volumes
scene.details: Brass microscopes and telescopes on shelves, glass beakers and test tubes in wooden racks, anatomical charts on walls, globe on stand, butterfly specimens in frames, stacks of scientific journals, gas lamp illuminating work area, chemical stains on desk surface, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Floor-to-ceiling bookshelves, framed diplomas and certificates, window showing Warsaw rooftops at dusk
scene.atmosphere: Intense scholarly concentration, a sanctuary of learning contrasting with commercial world below

composition.cameraAngle: Medium shot from slightly above, showing scientist at work
composition.focus: The merchant's intense concentration on his scientific pursuits
composition.depth: Desk and equipment in foreground, bookshelves in middle ground, window with city view in background
